product_name: ACR Electronics ResQLink+ GPS Personal Locator Beacon
long_description: The buoyant ACR Electronics ResQLink+ GPS personal locator beacon offers all the features of the ResQLink--plus it floats! It's ideal for boaters, anglers and anyone else on or around the water.
short_description: The buoyant ACR Electronics ResQLink+ GPS personal locator beacon offers all the features of the ResQLink--plus it floats! It's ideal for boaters, anglers and anyone else on or around the water.
